settings.name: Moderator Hide
settings.description: Moderator has chosen to hide the content.

account.name: Content Blocked
account.description: This account has been hidden by the moderators.

content.name: Content Blocked
content.description: This content has been hidden by the moderators.

settings.name: Moderator Filter
settings.description: Moderator has chosen to filter the content from feeds.

account.name: N/A
account.description: N/A

content.name: N/A
content.description: N/A

settings.name: Moderator Warn
settings.description: Moderator has chosen to set a general warning on the content.

account.name: Content Warning
account.description: This account has received a general warning from moderators.

content.name: Content Warning
content.description: This content has received a general warning from moderators.

settings.name: Sign-in Required
settings.description: This user has requested that their account only be shown to signed-in users.

account.name: Sign-in Required
account.description: This user has requested that their account only be shown to signed-in users.

content.name: Sign-in Required
content.description: This user has requested that their content only be shown to signed-in users.

settings.name: Copyright Violation
settings.description: The content has received a DMCA takedown request.

account.name: Copyright Violation
account.description: This account has received a DMCA takedown request. It will be restored if the concerns can be resolved.

content.name: Copyright Violation
content.description: This content has received a DMCA takedown request. It will be restored if the concerns can be resolved.

settings.name: Doxxing
settings.description: Information that reveals private information about someone which has been shared without the consent of the subject.

account.name: Doxxing
account.description: This account has been reported to publish private information about someone without their consent. This report is currently under review.

content.name: Doxxing
content.description: This content has been reported to include private information about someone without their consent.

settings.name: Pornography
settings.description: Images of full-frontal nudity (genitalia) in any sexualized context, or explicit sexual activity (meaning contact with genitalia or breasts) even if partially covered. Includes graphic sexual cartoons (often jokes/memes).

account.name: Adult Content
account.description: This account contains imagery of full-frontal nudity or explicit sexual activity.

content.name: Adult Content
content.description: This content contains imagery of full-frontal nudity or explicit sexual activity.

settings.name: Sexually Suggestive
settings.description: Content that does not meet the level of "pornography", but is still sexual. Some common examples have been selfies and "hornyposting" with underwear on, or partially naked (naked but covered, eg with hands or from side perspective). Sheer/see-through nipples may end up in this category.

account.name: Suggestive Content
account.description: This account contains imagery which is sexually suggestive. Common examples include selfies in underwear or in partial undress.

content.name: Suggestive Content
content.description: This content contains imagery which is sexually suggestive. Common examples include selfies in underwear or in partial undress.

settings.name: Nudity
settings.description: Nudity which is not sexual, or that is primarily "artistic" in nature. For example: breastfeeding; classic art paintings and sculptures; newspaper images with some nudity; fashion modeling. "Erotic photography" is likely to end up in sexual or porn.

account.name: Adult Content
account.description: This account contains imagery which portrays nudity in a non-sexual or artistic setting.

content.name: Adult Content
content.description: This content contains imagery which portrays nudity in a non-sexual or artistic setting.

settings.name: NSFL
settings.description: "Not Suitable For Life." This includes graphic images like the infamous "goatse" (don't look it up).

account.name: Graphic Imagery (NSFL)
account.description: This account contains graphic images which are often referred to as "Not Suitable For Life."

content.name: Graphic Imagery (NSFL)
content.description: This content contains graphic images which are often referred to as "Not Suitable For Life."

settings.name: Corpse
settings.description: Visual image of a dead human body in any context. Includes war images, hanging, funeral caskets. Does not include all figurative cases (cartoons), but can include realistic figurative images or renderings.

account.name: Graphic Imagery (Corpse)
account.description: This account contains images of a dead human body in any context. Includes war images, hanging, funeral caskets.

content.name: Graphic Imagery (Corpse)
content.description: This content contains images of a dead human body in any context. Includes war images, hanging, funeral caskets.

settings.name: Gore
settings.description: Intended for shocking images, typically involving blood or visible wounds.

account.name: Graphic Imagery (Gore)
account.description: This account contains shocking images involving blood or visible wounds.

content.name: Graphic Imagery (Gore)
content.description: This content contains shocking images involving blood or visible wounds.

settings.name: Torture
settings.description: Depictions of torture of a human or animal (animal cruelty).

account.name: Graphic Imagery (Torture)
account.description: This account contains depictions of torture of a human or animal.

content.name: Graphic Imagery (Torture)
content.description: This content contains depictions of torture of a human or animal.

settings.name: Self-Harm
settings.description: A visual depiction (photo or figurative) of cutting, suicide, or similar.

account.name: Graphic Imagery (Self-Harm)
account.description: This account includes depictions of cutting, suicide, or other forms of self-harm.

content.name: Graphic Imagery (Self-Harm)
content.description: This content includes depictions of cutting, suicide, or other forms of self-harm.

settings.name: Racial Intolerance
settings.description: Hateful or intolerant content related to race.

account.name: Intolerance (Racial)
account.description: This account includes hateful or intolerant content related to race.

content.name: Intolerance (Racial)
content.description: This content includes hateful or intolerant views related to race.

settings.name: Gender Intolerance
settings.description: Hateful or intolerant content related to gender or gender identity.

account.name: Intolerance (Gender)
account.description: This account includes hateful or intolerant content related to gender or gender identity.

content.name: Intolerance (Gender)
content.description: This content includes hateful or intolerant views related to gender or gender identity.

settings.name: Sexual Orientation Intolerance
settings.description: Hateful or intolerant content related to sexual preferences.

account.name: Intolerance (Orientation)
account.description: This account includes hateful or intolerant content related to sexual preferences.

content.name: Intolerance (Orientation)
content.description: This content includes hateful or intolerant views related to sexual preferences.

settings.name: Religious Intolerance
settings.description: Hateful or intolerant content related to religious views or practices.

account.name: Intolerance (Religious)
account.description: This account includes hateful or intolerant content related to religious views or practices.

content.name: Intolerance (Religious)
content.description: This content includes hateful or intolerant views related to religious views or practices.

settings.name: Intolerance
settings.description: A catchall for hateful or intolerant content which is not covered elsewhere.

account.name: Intolerance
account.description: This account includes hateful or intolerant content.

content.name: Intolerance
content.description: This content includes hateful or intolerant views.

settings.name: Intolerant Iconography
settings.description: Visual imagery associated with a hate group, such as the KKK or Nazi, in any context (supportive, critical, documentary, etc).

account.name: Intolerant Iconography
account.description: This account includes imagery associated with a hate group such as the KKK or Nazis. This warning may apply to content any context, including critical or documentary purposes.

content.name: Intolerant Iconography
content.description: This content includes imagery associated with a hate group such as the KKK or Nazis. This warning may apply to content any context, including critical or documentary purposes.

settings.name: Threats
settings.description: Statements or imagery published with the intent to threaten, intimidate, or harm.

account.name: Threats
account.description: The moderators believe this account has published statements or imagery with the intent to threaten, intimidate, or harm others.

content.name: Threats
content.description: The moderators believe this content was published with the intent to threaten, intimidate, or harm others.

settings.name: Spoiler
settings.description: Discussion about film, TV, etc which gives away plot points.

account.name: Spoiler Warning
account.description: This account contains discussion about film, TV, etc which gives away plot points.

content.name: Spoiler Warning
content.description: This content contains discussion about film, TV, etc which gives away plot points.

settings.name: Spam
settings.description: Repeat, low-quality messages which are clearly not designed to add to a conversation or space.

account.name: Spam
account.description: This account publishes repeat, low-quality messages which are clearly not designed to add to a conversation or space.

content.name: Spam
content.description: This content is a part of repeat, low-quality messages which are clearly not designed to add to a conversation or space.

settings.name: Security Concerns
settings.description: Content designed to hijack user accounts such as a phishing attack.

account.name: Security Warning
account.description: This account has published content designed to hijack user accounts such as a phishing attack.

content.name: Security Warning
content.description: This content is designed to hijack user accounts such as a phishing attack.

settings.name: Network Attacks
settings.description: Content designed to attack network systems such as denial-of-service attacks.

account.name: Network Attack Warning
account.description: This account has published content designed to attack network systems such as denial-of-service attacks.

content.name: Network Attack Warning
content.description: This content is designed to attack network systems such as denial-of-service attacks.

settings.name: Impersonation
settings.description: Accounts which falsely assert some identity.

account.name: Impersonation Warning
account.description: The moderators believe this account is lying about their identity.

content.name: Impersonation Warning
content.description: The moderators believe this account is lying about their identity.

settings.name: Scam
settings.description: Fraudulent content.

account.name: Scam Warning
account.description: The moderators believe this account publishes fraudulent content.

content.name: Scam Warning
content.description: The moderators believe this is fraudulent content.

settings.name: Misleading
settings.description: Accounts which share misleading information.

account.name: Misleading
account.description: The moderators believe this account is spreading misleading information.

content.name: Misleading
content.description: The moderators believe this account is spreading misleading information.
